descriptionHtml:
[center]
============
[color=green]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
I decided to put a little variety in our lives:):)
This mod add Ma'saani - Argonian
Essential , Auto-level , 1H weapon , Heavy Armor , Marryable
About bugs write to PM
Age 20 , Even toned voice
[color=green]You can find her in Old Hroldan[/color]
I hope you like it

=============
[color=green]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
CBBE


=============
[color=green]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder

=============
[color=green]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=green]CREDITS:[/color]
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod[/center]
author: Den987
